text: Kodi iwo sadayende pa dziko ndi kuona zimene zidawaonekera anthu amene adalipo kale? Iwo adali ndi mphamvu zambiri kuposa awa, ndipo adakumba nthaka ndiponso adamanga pa nthakayo nyumba zambiri kuposa zimene awa amanga. Ndipo kudadza kwa iwo Atumwi awo ndi chiphunzitso chomveka ndipo sikudali koyenera kuti Mulungu awachitire zinthu zosalungama koma kuti iwo adalakwira mizimu yawo
